item.title: Container Runtime
item.description: From Docker to Kubernetes, these days container solutions are emerging. {: .center-image width=“1000px”} Why Docker? source: https://www.docker.com. They clear state that Docker is a Container Runtime. In the era of Docker the term “Container runtime” was quite clear; the software that runs and manages containers. but as the internal architecture is being complicated and various container frameworks are introduced, this definition becomes unclear. Here are very clear explanations what is container runtime exactly, written by Ian Lewis:
